TopicTitle: Tripleship 6 Stage - Won't Wobble EVER | KSP .17

Articles.Content:
I spent a couple hours trying to find the most stable configuration for a rocket capable of delivering about 50 tons of payload to orbit. This is what I came up with:

*It doesn't wobble at all

*Quickly and easily maneuvers in flight and orbit

*Fuel aplenty for flights nearly anywhere in the Solar (Kerbar?) System

*249 parts (with MechJeb)

*216.8 tons in total

*About 51 tons in 100km orbit

MY TITLE SUCKS - THIS IS NOT SIX STAGES OF SOLID ROCKET BOOSTERS!

Here is an album with some images: http://imgur.com/a/3fMh8

The .craft file that is listed requires MechJeb 1.9.3 for KSP .17:

http://fpk.im/HAnp
